local_intent: Detect grapes with retry, approach and precisely align to grape_cluster, briefly settle, then verify alignment by checking position at target.
assumptions: grape_cluster is visible or becomes visible within 3 detection attempts
coherence_with_global: Respects global plan by retrying detection, aligning with tolerance 0.005 to grape_cluster, adding a brief stabilization wait, and verifying position; does not proceed to grasp/place.
